Description: Fragment of rim and wall of East Greek pottery bowl; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed below with added red band lined in white; top of rim glazed; exterior: band of dots at rim with line below; part of elaborate floral design in field below, with opne leaf in added red. One repair hole and probably an aborted second one.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1217)
